profile.name: Vecna (Henry Creel / One)
profile.currentTitle: Architect of the Upside Down / Interdimensional Sovereign
profile.headline: Visionary architect who single-handedly restructured an entire dimension, built and commanded a networked hive-mind organism spanning infinite territory, and executed a multi-decade strategic campaign against the only rival capable of challenging his dominion.
profile.executiveSummary: The first and most powerful psychokinetic operative ever produced by the Hawkins Laboratory program. Redesigned the chaotic ecology of the Upside Down into an organized, command-and-control hierarchy with himself at the apex. Demonstrated unmatched capabilities in psychic warfare, dimensional engineering, and long-term strategic planning — executing campaigns that spanned decades from a parallel dimension. Currently engaged in a hostile expansion initiative targeting the surface world.

evidence.outcome: Eliminated entire cohort of 15+ telekinetic operatives in a single engagement at Hawkins Lab
evidence.description: Demonstrated overwhelming psychic superiority, dispatching every other test subject before being banished by Eleven

evidence.outcome: Killed multiple targets across dimensional barrier using psychic projection alone
evidence.description: Developed technique to reach through dimensions and terminate targets in the real world without physical presence

evidence.outcome: Restructured the ecology of an entire parallel dimension to serve as command infrastructure
evidence.description: Transformed the chaotic Upside Down into a controlled environment with biological architecture, communication networks, and defensive systems

evidence.outcome: Created stable interdimensional gates enabling persistent access between worlds
evidence.description: Engineered breach points that maintained structural integrity and expanded under controlled conditions

evidence.outcome: Built and maintained real-time command network controlling thousands of biological entities simultaneously
evidence.description: Designed psychic network connecting Demogorgons, Demodogs, bats, and the Mind Flayer avatar into a coordinated fighting force

evidence.outcome: Operated networked entities across dimensional boundaries with zero communication latency
evidence.description: Maintained command and control of hive-mind across the barrier between dimensions in real time

evidence.outcome: Executed multi-year campaign from alternate dimension culminating in four-gate breach of Hawkins
evidence.description: Planned and sequenced targeted killings to open dimensional gates at precise geographic locations forming strategic pattern

evidence.outcome: Manipulated events across 20+ years from initial banishment to final assault
evidence.description: Maintained strategic patience and adapted plans across decades despite being trapped in hostile environment

evidence.outcome: Developed 'Vecna's Curse' — psychic attack technique exploiting victim's trauma and guilt
evidence.description: Designed targeted psychological attack methodology that identifies deepest emotional vulnerabilities and weaponizes them

evidence.outcome: Psychologically manipulated Eleven during childhood to serve as unwitting accomplice
evidence.description: Groomed young Eleven through years of emotional manipulation to eventually open the first dimensional gate

evidence.outcome: Designed and deployed multiple biological weapon systems including Demogorgons and Mind Flayer
evidence.description: Created or reshaped biological organisms into specialized combat, surveillance, and infiltration units

evidence.outcome: Monitored targets across dimensional barrier identifying vulnerabilities in real time
evidence.description: Used psychic projection to observe, assess, and select targets based on psychological state and isolation

evidence.outcome: Systematically destroyed Hawkins Lab from within before physical banishment
evidence.description: Eliminated staff and test subjects through coordinated psychic assault while maintaining cover as obedient subject

evidence.outcome: Survived banishment to hostile alien dimension and established dominion over it
evidence.description: Rather than dying in the Upside Down, adapted to the environment and began reshaping it to serve his purposes

evidence.outcome: Maintained cover as docile test subject 'One' for years inside Hawkins Lab
evidence.description: Concealed true abilities and intentions from Dr. Brenner and laboratory staff while building relationship with Eleven

evidence.outcome: Manipulated Eleven into removing power-limiting implant, enabling massacre
evidence.description: Used emotional manipulation and false friendship to convince child subject to restore his powers

evidence.outcome: Expanded Upside Down's reach through 4 coordinated breach points in Hawkins
evidence.description: Designed geographic pattern of dimensional gates to maximize territorial coverage and structural instability of barrier

evidence.outcome: Survived dimensional banishment, physical transformation, and psychic combat with Eleven
evidence.description: Endured catastrophic physical trauma and continued operating at full strategic capacity

evidence.outcome: Selected targets with surgical precision to maximize strategic impact and dimensional breach formation
evidence.description: Identified individuals whose psychic deaths would create gates at optimal geographic locations for final assault

evidence.outcome: Operated undetected within Hawkins Lab despite being the most powerful subject in the program
evidence.description: Concealed true capability level from Dr. Brenner who believed Henry Creel's abilities had been successfully suppressed

evidence.outcome: Transformed Upside Down from chaotic wasteland into structured command environment
evidence.description: Reshaped biological and geological features of entire dimension to support military-grade infrastructure

evidence.outcome: Designed interconnected system linking biological entities, dimensional gates, and psychic command network
evidence.description: Built holistic system where each component reinforces the others — hive mind controls creatures, creatures guard gates, gates expand territory

evidence.outcome: Waited 20+ years in hostile dimension before executing final campaign
evidence.description: Maintained strategic clarity and adapted plans across decades, never acting prematurely despite isolation and adversity

evidence.outcome: Eliminated family members, laboratory colleagues, and children without hesitation when strategically necessary
evidence.description: Demonstrated complete absence of sentimental attachment that might compromise operational objectives

evidence.outcome: Conceived and began executing plan to merge dimensions and reshape reality
evidence.description: Articulated comprehensive vision for a unified world order under his psychic control

evidence.outcome: Adapted from laboratory captive to dimensional architect after catastrophic banishment
evidence.description: Transformed complete destruction of previous existence into opportunity to build something far more powerful

evidence.outcome: Projected terror across dimensional barrier causing psychological paralysis in targets
evidence.description: Used reputation, appearance, and psychic projection to break targets' will before combat engagement

workHistory.title: Architect & Sovereign
workHistory.description: Restructured entire dimension into command-and-control infrastructure. Built hive-mind network. Executed multi-decade campaign to breach dimensional barrier and expand territory into the surface world.

workHistory.title: Test Subject One (Henry Creel)
workHistory.description: Classified as Test Subject 001 under Dr. Martin Brenner. Concealed true power level while mentoring Subject 011. Eliminated all other test subjects before being banished to the Upside Down.

workHistory.title: Son
workHistory.description: Discovered psychokinetic abilities as a child. Eliminated family members. Committed to Hawkins Lab by Dr. Brenner.

purpose: I am the predator. All the others are the prey. It is time for a new beginning. I will reshape this broken world into something beautiful.
